text: This is the picture. Just tell me what's happening in the picture. The boy is slipping off the stool. He's trying to steal cookies. One mother is working at the sink with the water running over. She's uh... The little girl is uh saying shh. So the mother don't hear. Did I say the sink was running over? Okay. Mm hm. You did. Mother's drawing again. okay you did Mother's drying the dishes. I don't see anything else. Okay, bye.
